page.title: 06GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: RECREATION GAMES CHILDREN PLAY Tag, Redletter, Conkers, Bulldog, Hopscoth, Marbles, Piggy Back Fights, Koola, Scots and English, Ball-it, 4040 Home, Roller Skating, Off Ground He, Lemon Curd, Sticky Toffee, Penny at the wall,Chariot-it, Sevensy, Skipping Tag - a game for 3 or more players, The person who is "it" chases the others. Anyone caught becomes "it" Bulldog - the person who is "it" stands in the centre of the playground with all the other players at one end. When "it" calls Bulldog players rush to get to the other end of the playground without being touched. Anyone touched joins "it" in the centre for the round. Ball-it - played with a sponge ball or tennis ball. The object of the game is to avoid being hit by the ball
